Key Function Key Function Key Function Key Function
A1 5 P1 Coin 6 P2 Coin 7 P3 Coin 8 P4 Coin
A2 1 P1 Start 2 P2 Start 3 P3 Start 4 P4 Start
A3 Right Arrow P1 Right G P2 Right End P3 Right Numpad-6 P4 Right
A4 Left Arrow P1 Left D P2 Left Home P3 Left Numpad-4 P4 Left
A5 Up Arrow P1 Up R P2 Up Page Up P3 Up Numpad-8 P4 Up
A6 Down Arrow P1 Down F P2 Down Page Down P3 Down Numpad-2 P4 Down
A7 L-Ctrl P1 Button 1 A P2 Button 1 R-Ctrl P3 Button 1 Numpad-0 P4 Button 1
A8 L-Alt P1 Button 2 S P2 Button 2 R-Shift P3 Button 2 Numpad-Decimal P4 Button 2
A9 Space P1 Button 3 Q P2 Button 3 Enter P3 Button 3 Numpad-Enter P4 Button 3
A10 L-Shift P1 Button 4 W P2 Button 4 Forward Slash (/) P3 Button 4 Numpad-Plus P4 Button 4
B1 Z P1 Button 5 I P2 Button 5 Period (.) P3 Button 5 Numpad-Minus P4 Button 5
B2 X P1 Button 6 J P2 Button 6 Comma (,) P3 Button 6 Numpad-Asterix P4 Button 6
B3 C P1 Button 7 K P2 Button 7
B4 V P1 Button 8 L P2 Button 8
B5 Enter Select Enter Select Enter Select Enter Select
B6 P Pause P Pause P Pause P Pause
B7 F7 Load/Save F7 Load/Save F7 Load/Save F7 Load/Save
B8 Tab Config Tab Config Tab Config Tab Config
B9 Esc Cancel Esc Cancel Esc Cancel Esc Cancel
B10 *External LED
Connect External LED to identify mode.

Use HWB to toggle between the various modes. The active mode is remembered when KADE is powered off.
